summary:
Meet Anita, a Breton Archer. She can be found in Solitude near the well and market stands.
(Using coc SolitudeArch in the console will bring you rather close to her)
descriptionHtml:
Meet Anita, a Breton Archer. She can be found in Solitude near the well and market stands.
(Using coc SolitudeArch in the console will bring you rather close to her)

This mod is standalone, and only requires Skyrim to run it.

Anita was a requested follower. If you want me to make you a follower, go right ahead!
https://epicmantdog.wufoo.com/forms/skyrim-follower-mod-request/

Enjoy! :)
author: EpicmanTdog
